ENGLISH: We have requested aid from foreign powers. We can only hope they respond kindly.
It is out of our hands.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has asked we give them a grant. How much should we give?
Our money is better spent at home.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to give us aid on the order of thousands of pounds.
How much money would you like to give $FROMCOUNTRY$ (thousands)?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to give us aid on the order of tens of thousands of pounds.
How much money would you like to give $FROMCOUNTRY$ (tens of thousands)?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to give us aid on the order of hundereds of thousands of pounds.
How much money would you like to give $FROMCOUNTRY$ (hundreds of thousands)?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to give us aid on the order of millions of pounds.
How much money would you like to give $FROMCOUNTRY$ (millions)?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ decided against giving us a grant
I guess we just have to print more money...
How much aid would you like to give $FROMCOUNTRY$ (hundreds of pounds)
